## [0.1.0] – 2025-09-21
### Added
- Tags on offers + tag filtering.
- Notifications page with “Mark all read”.
- Inbox linking from bell + offer/request links.
- Password sign-in support (email+password).

### Fixed

- Browse page 404 on Vercel.
